verses.roman:
sannyāsīra gaṇa prabhure yadi upekṣila
bhakta-duḥkha khaṇḍāite tāre kṛpā kaila

synonyms: sannyāsīra gaṇa—all the sannyāsīs; prabhure—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; yadi—when; upekṣila—criticized; bhakta-duḥkha—the unhappiness of the devotees; khaṇḍāite—to drive away; tāre—to them; kṛpā kaila—showed His mercy.
translation: When the Māyāvādī sannyāsīs at Vārāṇasī criticized Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, the Lord's devotees became very depressed. To satisfy them, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu showed His mercy to the sannyāsīs.
